title: Active Knee Extension
description: Knee extension strengthens muscles in front of thigh and shin. Lie supine on mat and bend knee at right angle.

title: Heel Slides
description: The heel slide is a mobility exercise to increase the range of knee flexion at the joint.

title: Active Hamstrings
description: Hamstring curls strengthen the muscles in the back of the thigh.

title: Sitting Knee Flexion
description: Knee flexion help increase the range of motion available at the joint.

title: Inner-Range Quad Sitting
description: Inner Range Quadriceps exercise helps strengthen the muscles around the knee.

title: Quadriceps Stretch
description: The quadriceps exercise will help strengthen the quadriceps muscles resulting in increased flexibility, improved circulation, and reduced stress.
